Notes.Text:
This update for gstreamer-plugins-bad fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-37329: Fixed a heap overwrite in PGS subtitle overlay decoder which might trigger a crash or remote code execution. (bsc#1213126)
Notes.Title: Details
